name: BonziBuddy.exe
description: Collection: virus.uwu This collection consists a series of 3 pieces, each one is the representation of a computer "virus" (malware) that had a significant impact on the internet. Bonzi Buddy has his own spyware. It is a malicious executable program that is installed with or without the user's knowledge, it can be integrated with another downloaded application, downloaded through peer-to-peer communications (P2P), it can enter through explorer vulnerabilities or deceptive pop-up boxes.
